ygData.subject: RE: Imbrued Armor updated Last patch
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh heh, again if you use Verant s definition of extensive testing which does not include testing damage spells to the point of targeting a bat in a newbie
ygData.messageBody:
Heh heh, again if you use Verant's definition of "extensive testing" which
does not include testing damage spells to the point of "targeting a bat in a
newbie zone", gawds I love that saying, their statement is perfectly true.
"Extensive testing" = Its in the drop table and everything compiled.

Kitasi the skeptical

-----Original Message-----
From: M Sanford (Maev) [mailto:pr0teus@...]
Sent: Friday, December 03, 1999 7:45 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Imbrued Armor updated Last patch


From: "M Sanford (Maev)" <pr0teus@...>

Wow this is great news. I had been ranting about the bard's AC penalty on
our imbrued armor.. didn't think
anyone gave half a crap but at least the changes were made.
I can only bash Verant so much in one day... but why is our stuff suddenly
dropping now when they were
quoted on saying something like "after extensive testing, we've determined
that imbrued armor is still
dropping" before the patch. That was posted on EQ Casters I believe after
the issue was raised that our
armor hadn't been dropping.

Perhaps you guys out there with full suits of imbrued might tell us of the
ac bonuses.

Maev Lorekeeper
Tarew Marr

SteelWolf wrote:

> From: SteelWolf <steelwolf@...>
>
> Good news - the imbrued plate dropped in the alter planes for Bards has
> received an upgrade in AC for several pieces. I don't know what all the
> changes were, but ac upgrades are always welcome.
>
> The other good news is Imbrued is now dropping again in Plane of Hate.
> It hasn't dropped since the patch that tweaked the Monster AI in PoH,
> and now drops on scorn banshees.
>
> Ariell Thunderwolf, Karana
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
